title: OIDC authentication.extra-params not added to dev-services auth request
body:
### Describe the bug

When using the Auth0 provider, i would like to get an access_token in a JWT format. To get this, auth0 says i need to set an audience query parameter when requesting the token via /authorize.

I have configured the quarkus property:
`quarkus.oidc.authentication.extra-params.audience=my-audience`

However "audience" is not added to the authentication query param:

```
https://<server-url>/authorize?client_id=<client_id>&redirect_uri=http://localhost:8080/q/dev-ui/io.quarkus.quarkus-oidc/auth0-provider&scope=openid profile&response_type=code&response_mode=query&prompt=login&nonce=yN1mogD&state=hyFUmSF
```

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/22498171/a5cb1689-6bce-405f-a2aa-695e80719e22)



### Expected behavior

I expected anything added to quarkus.oidc.authentication.extra-params would be passed to "/authorize"

### Actual behavior

The audience param is not added to the "/authorize" route.

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux danprueitt-fedora 6.6.13-200.fc39.x86_64 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Sat Jan 20 18:03:28 UTC 2024 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 21.0.1 2023-10-17 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-21.0.1+12 (build 21.0.1+12-LTS) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-21.0.1+12 (build 21.0.1+12-LTS, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.6.8

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.6 (bc0240f3c744dd6b6ec2920b3cd08dcc295161ae)

### Additional information

_No response_
